property.name: manager-config
property.value: port=8898 #http http.port=9099 #zookeeper zookeeper.servers=localhost:2181 #environment currentEnv=release #\u76D1\u63A7\u68C0\u6D4B\u9891\u7387\uFF0C\u5355\u4F4Ds monitor.check.intervalTime=30 #\u521B\u5EFAmysqltask\u65F6\uFF0C\u662F\u5426\u5F00\u542F\u8BFB\u7AEF\u591A\u8DEF\u590D\u7528 multiplexingRead=false # min jvm memory for flinker job flinker.job.min.jvmMemory=1G # max jvm memory for flinker job flinker.job.max.jvmMemory=2G
